TextEng: Time stream? What in Faerun are you talking about?
A wild mage. No wonder you're talking crazy.
Time stream, temporal reference... What are you talking about?
Text: 시간의 흐름, 시간적 기준점... 무슨 말이야?

TextEng: Could you just get to the point please?
I can't take anymore of this. I'm out of here.
I don't really have time for this.
Do you know anything about this Creator Race?
Text: 창조자 종족에 대해 아는 거 있어?

TextEng: Are the sun dials still working?
I'm searching for a Word of Power.
Forget it, I'm not your lackey!
Why don't you do this yourself?
Tell me about these guardian golems.
So the Word of Power is inside the ruins?
Text: 그럼 권능의 언령이 유적 안에 있다는 거야?

TextEng: How do I use the sun dial?
Do you know anything about the Creator Race?
Text: 창조자 종족에 대해 아는 게 있어?

TextEng: I have some questions for you.
Okay, I think I got it. Anything else?
<StartCheck>[Insight]</Start> If I can't bring anything back from the past I can't bring back the Word of Power from the vault, can I?
Text: <StartCheck>[통찰]</Start> 과거에서 아무것도 가져올 수 없다면, 금고에서 권능의 언령도 가져올 수 없는 거잖아?

TextEng: Let's recap what you told me last time.
Thank you, Sapphira. You are most generous.
<StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> I give you a tree that was ten thousand years in the making, and all you give me is a handful of gems?
Text: <StartCheck>[설득]</Start> 만 년에 걸쳐 자란 나무를 줬는데, 겨우 보석 몇 개야?

TextEng: You better cough up something else or you'll end up dead at the foot of this tree!
Text: 다른 거 내놔. 안 그러면 이 나무 밑에서 죽을 줄 알아!

TextEng: Tell again what you tell before.
<StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> Me want more! Me give big old tree. Old, old, old tree!
Text: <StartCheck>[설득]</Start> 나 더 원해! 나 큰 오래된 나무 줬어. 오래오래오래된 나무!

TextEng: Give more or me stomp you!
Wild mage? No wonder you crazy!
Time stream? Temp... 'ral revnance? Me no get it.
Text: 시간 흐름? 시... 간적 기준? 나 모르겠어.

TextEng: Me not want listen no more. Me go now.
Text: 나 더 듣기 싫어. 나 간다.

TextEng: Me not got time for this.
You not boss of me! Me no do this!
Text: 너 내 보스 아냐! 나 안 해!

TextEng: What me get if me do this?
Why you no do this yourself?
Power Word be inside crumbly buildings?
Text: 힘 말이 무너진 건물 안에 있어?

TextEng: You need tell more at me?
